target.name: usage
target.echo: This is the build file for BroadleafCommerceDemo
Use "Clean" to delete the temporary build directories in the project.
Use "Deploy Exploded War" to deploy the application as an exploded war
Use "Deploy War" to deploy the war unexploded
Use "Start Tomcat - Debug Mode" to start Tomcat in debug mode. You will need to configure remote debugging in eclipse (port 8000) to connect.
Use "Stop Tomcat" to shut down the running server
Use "Generate Java Docs" to generate javadocs from source code
Use "app.synch" to synchronize the JSPs, images, CSS, and JS files with the server. This can be configured to happen automatically when something is saved in Eclipse.
Use "Load Data" to truncate and load initial data
